thread.title: Tesla: Turn That Frown Upside Down

author: Charley Grant
title: Tesla: Turn That Frown Upside Down
text: At least someone on Wall Street still reads the newspaper. Analysts at R.W. Baird named Tesla a “fresh pick” on Wednesday morning, with a $411 price target, about 50% higher than today’s stock price. One reason for the enthusiasm: negative headlines in articles about the company have lately “increased substantially,” and “increasingly immaterial” headlines dominate news cycles, the analysts Brexit & Beyond: Europe Trails America Like Never Before Next In Russia, Company Downgrades Analyst
